Contributor: Housh, artist.; Thomas, Geo. P., printer.;
Note: Signed "Housh." Date based on America's participation in the war. "17-3" appears on the bottom left of the poster. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says simply "Preserve."  Illustration shows Lady Liberty holding a scale with fresh fruit and vegetables on one side and containers of preserves on the other side.  A number of women are lined up behind her.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.
Subject: Food conservation -- United States.; World War, 1914-1918 -- Propaganda.; War posters, American.;

Title: Preserve
